H0.text: how many times have real madrid won the champions league in a row. Three

H1.text: how many times have real madrid won the champions league in a row. Two

H2.text: how many times have real madrid won the champions league in a row. One

H3.text: how many times have real madrid won the champions league in a row. five

A4.text: In the 2017–18 UEFA Champions League, Madrid once again progressed to the final where they defeated Liverpool 3–1 to become the first club to win three straight titles in the Champions League era

A5.text: the first team to win three consecutive titles in the European Cup/Champions League since Bayern Munich in 1976
